long.en:
Simple Consent Mode Checker

With the Simple Consent Mode Checker Chrome Extension, you can quickly and easily check if the Consent Mode is active on a website and which permissions are set. An essential tool for website operators, data protection officers, and developers!

ğŸš€ Main Features:

- Consent Mode Status: Check if the Consent Mode is active on the current website.
- Detailed Permissions Overview: Get a clear overview of the set permissions, such as:
ğŸ“Š analytics_storage
ğŸ›’ ad_storage
ğŸ‘¤ ad_user_data
ğŸ¯ ad_personalization
ğŸ§© personalization_storage
âš™ï¸ functionality_storage
ğŸ” security_storage

Comparison of Default and Updated Settings: See at a glance which permissions are denied or allowed by default and which have been updated by the Consent Mode.

ğŸ” Why Simple Consent Mode Checker?

- Data Protection Compliance: Ensure that your website complies with GDPR and other data protection regulations.
- Optimize User Experience: Adjust permissions to improve user experience without violating data protection guidelines.
- Easy to Use: The extension offers a user-friendly interface that allows you to quickly and efficiently access the relevant information.
